attributes.action: undertake the proper regulation for UK players using online gambling poker sites.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment, online poker sites are regulated by places like Gibraltar. And I strongly believe that the UK government should be regulating 0nline poker to Protect UK players from getting ripped off, By  carrying out routine checks of the poker sites RNG (random number generator) and enforcing Fair play. The gambling operators cannot be trusted to self regulate as they are primarily interested in maximising their profits.
